javamorph
Class CPolygonDecorator

java.lang.Object
  javamorph.CPolygonDecorator
All Implemented Interfaces:
MouseMotionListener, EventListener, IDecorator
public class CPolygonDecorator
extends Object
implements IDecorator, MouseMotionListener

Version:
1.0
Author:
claus.erhard.wimmer@googlemail.com
Program: JavaMorph V 1.0.
Class: CPolygonDecorator.
License: GPLv2.
Description: Draw the polygon to the parent component.
Hint: User can move polygon points by mouse. Used to merge the pictures selectively. Pixel operations performed on one of the booth ratio matrixes.

Field Summary
private  boolean active
          If true then the user can move polygon points by mouse.
private  double[][] clip
          Clip matrix to merge pictures selectively, generated by the polygon.
static Color CURSOR_COLOR
          Color of the polygon point move cursor.
private  int idx
          Index of the current polygon point which has the cursor.
private  boolean left
          If true then this instance belongs to the left picture.
private  CFrame parent
          Parent component to draw the polygon to.
private  Point[] polygon
          Points of the clip polygon.
static Color POLYGON_COLOR
          Color of the polygon lines.
private  Queue<Point> queue
          Queue for the flood fill algorithm to mark the inner of the polygon.
private  double[][] shadow
          Shadow clip matrix buffer.

getClip

public double[][] getClip()
Provide the clip matrix.

Returns:
Ratio matrix of row / column.

debugClip

public void debugClip(File f)
Write the clip matrix as PNG into the debug directory. The application doesn't read the file. Ratio 0.0 -> color(0) and ratio 1.0 -> color(255).

Parameters:
f -

fill

private boolean fill()
Fill the inner of the polygon with ratio 1.0.

Returns:
true if not ready.

fill

private void fill(Point p)
Called by fill() for a single pixel. Fill the orthogonal environment of the pixel.

Parameters:
p -

scanLine

private Point scanLine()
Look for one pixel in the inner of the polygon. The pixel shall lay of a vertical line between to pixels with the ratio of 1.0. It self shall have a ratio of 0.0.

Returns:
Inner Point of polygon.

drawLine

private void drawLine(Point p1,
                      Point p2)
Draw a line between two polygon points into the clip matrix.

Parameters:
p1 - First point.
p2 - Second point.

smoothLine

private void smoothLine(Point p1,
                        Point p2)
Smooth the contour of the clip matrix as dilatation. Work on the contour of clip & write to shadow.

Parameters:
p1 - First point.
p2 - Second point.

smoothCircle

private void smoothCircle(Point p)
Perform actually smooth for one pixel

Parameters:
p - The current pixel.
